page.description: Get the raw JSON array of arrays for the sheet and optional range.
page.prototype: GetSheetRaw as C(sheetname as C[, range as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.GetSheetRaw("customers") = [ [ "firstname", "lastname", ], [ "john", "public" ], [ "sam", "spade" ], ]
